landing.bio: Many factors contribute to why I am interested in designing and developing computer software. My tech stack includes Java, Python, and Javascript. Python for server-side and scripting and Javascript for the frontend. I use Node.Js framework for server-side development and React for the frontend development. I have also worked with GraphQL.

experience.aboutWork: Contributing to D&K's open event server and frontend as an intern. Resolved numerous bugs and added new features to the company's projects.
Worked on company's payment partner application and learned how to handle with server-side errors and continuously genrating entries.

education.university: Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)

projects.title: Expense Tracking System
projects.desc: This is a React version of the vanilla JS Expense Tracker. It uses functional components with hooks and the context API Keep track of income and expenses. Add and remove items and save to local storage.

projects.title: Dev-Connectivity Chat app
projects.desc: Realtime chat app with websockets using Node.js, Express and Socket.io with Vanilla JS on the frontend with a custom UI.

projects.title: StoryBooks
projects.desc: Create public and private stories from your life, this app uses Node.js/Express/MongoDB with Google OAuth for authentication

projects.title: Remote Desktop in Java
projects.desc: The main aim of this system is to provide remote access to the same networkâ€™s devices.

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors with my friends, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
